data.title: Aishwarya Rai & Abhishek Bachchan Houses & Other Properties – IndexTap Blogs
data.meta_description: Global superstars Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan require little introduction. Whether it's news about their wealth, beauty, or fame, they're almost always popular. Here, we look in depth at the couple's real estate wealth.
data.text:
Global superstars Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan require little introduction. Whether it’s news about their wealth, beauty, or fame, they’re almost always popular. Here, we look in depth at the couple’s real estate wealth.

The Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan house in Mumbai is frequently flooded with fans hoping to catch a glimpse of the stars. We give you a quick overview of the house they currently live in, as well as the other houses and properties they own.

Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan are global icons. One is the Miss World Beauty Pageant winner, the face of L’Oreal Paris, and a well-known actor, while the other is a successful actor from one of Bollywood’s most powerful families. They make an incredible pairing.

Given their reputation and popularity, it is understandable that they frequently make headlines. In this blog, we take a quick look at the property details of the two – Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan’s houses in Mumbai and elsewhere.

Quick Facts about Aishwarya Rai & Abhishek Bachchan House

Aishwarya Rai & Abhishek Bachchan’s House Details: Jalsa

Jalsa is a luxurious bungalow that exudes sophistication around every corner. In 1982, director Ramesh Sippy gave Amitabh Bachchan, Aishwarya’s father-in-law, the house as a gift. They have lived in Jalsa with Amitabh and Jaya Bachchan, as well as their daughter Aradhya, since they married in 2007.

Few Facts About this House

The house’s design is very minimalist, combining traditional and modern elements.

Jalsa notices that the palatial bungalow is an architectural marvel in design.

Each room and section of the house has been carefully and thoughtfully designed. The house’s notable areas include the grand entrance, living room, dining room, gourmet kitchen with cutting-edge kitchen appliances and tools, master suite, guest rooms, fitness and wellness sections, entertainment room, personal library and study room, in-house swimming pool, and staff quarters.

Both the interior and exterior of the house pay homage to traditional sensibilities as well as contemporary modes of thought. However, this approach to design is not visually jarring because each school of design blends seamlessly into the next.

Aishwarya Rai & Abhishek Bachchan’s House and Other Properties in India:

Aside from their primary residence in Jalsa, the couple has made several additional investments in the country. Some of these are listed below for easy browsing:

Skylark Towers Apartment, Worli, Mumbai

In 2015, Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan made a power couple-like move by investing in a luxury flat worth INR 21 crores in Worli, Mumbai. The flat is located in one of the most upscale residential complexes in Signia Isles, the Bandra-Kurla Complex. Talati Panthaky Associates designed the Signia Isles building, and Sunteck Realty, an in-house team, specifically designed the couple’s apartment.

Lonavala Farmhouse, Mumbai Hill Station

Aside from their bungalow and apartment in the bustling city of Mumbai, the couple also owns a serene farmhouse in Lonavala. This is a hill station located far from the hustle and bustle of city life, offering the couple an idyllic escape whenever they need it. The farmhouse includes luxurious amenities such as a tennis court, helipad, and swimming pool.

According to a report, Abhishek Bachchan purchased six apartments in Borivali, Abhishek Bachchan paid Rs 15.42 crore for six apartments in Mumbai’s Borivali neighbourhood. These properties are part of Oberoi Realty’s Oberoi Sky City project and total 4,894 sq ft, valued at Rs 31,498 per sq ft.

According to recent reports from one of India’s real estate aggregators, Abhishek Bachchan has purchased six apartments in a Mumbai suburb called Borivali. These six apartments cover a total of 4,894 square feet, with a property cost of Rs 31,498 per square foot.

Carpet Area and Property Price for Abhishek Bachchan’s New Apartments

Location of Abhishek Bachchan’s New House

The six new apartments are located on the 57th floor of a rising Western Express Highway (WEH) building in Borivali East.

Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan’s house and other properties are international.

The couple owns the two properties listed below on an international scale:

Dubai Villa, Jumeirah Golf Estates

Following in the footsteps of Shah Rukh Khan, Salman Khan, Anil Kapoor, and Sanjay Dutt, Aishwarya Rai and her partner own a luxury property in Dubai. The villa was bought in 2015 for a whopping INR 16 crore. The villa is located in Sanctuary Falls, Jumeirah Golf Estates, one of Dubai’s most luxurious artificial islands. The villa’s amenities are sure to impress, including a private swimming pool, Scavolini designer kitchen, Vileroy & Boch sanitary fixtures, Nolte wardrobes, and an in-house gym. The villa is opulent, comparable to the quality of properties owned by other global figures.

Property in New York City, USA

According to news reports, Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan bought a swanky flat in the heart of New York City around 2017. There is little public information available about this flat. It is assumed that the property serves as an investment to accommodate their global lifestyle and standards, as well as a second home for the family while touring the United States.

Conclusion of Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan’s House and Other Properties

Some of the biggest A-list stars in the Bollywood industry include Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan. Their fame and success have spread to foreign shores over the years. Although they primarily live in Jalsa, as is customary for global celebrities, the couple owns multiple properties around the world to maintain their lifestyle, wealth, and investment opportunities.
